title: Hard Cell
overview: Сan you really make an EV supercar, or an electric racing series, or simply head out into the wilderness for days on end with no charging points in sight? In this new series, Tom ‘Wookie' Ford is on a mission to drive the performance EVs that matter, interview those in the know, and deliver a verdict on whether or not the new generation of electric cars have got what it takes to take over the world.
